definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lift, bear (rare synon. of [[נׇשָׂא]] BAram Targum [[נְטַל]] lift; hence specif., Syr. nt.al sustulit (aquam), further, be heavy; also borrowed and denom. forms in Ar. and NH, cf. Frä:65 f.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[נ]] La 3:28; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִטּוֹל]] Is 40:15; Pt. act. [[נוֹטֵל]] 2Sa 24:12; —lift, c. acc. Is 40:15 (fig. subj. ´[[י]]); lift over thee ([[על]]) i.e. offer 2Sa 24:12, but rd. [[נוֹטֶה]] (as ‖ 1Ch 21:10) We Bu HPS; lift (and lay) upon ([[עַל]]) La 3:28.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. sf. [[וַיְנַטְּלֵם]] Is 63:9 and he bare them, fig. of ´[[י]] bearing his people (‖[[וַיְגַשֵּׁאֵם]]).
